Text.Page:
, I'm glad you're here.

The archdevans created an armored fangspawn to harass us while they headed south for a secret mission in Velika. Their mission failed... but the fangspawn is still here, and it's getting hungry.

The beast must be eliminated before it can claw its way out of the holding pen where we've trapped it.
Unfortunately, we can only send one person in at a time, which means you'll have to tackle the beast alone.
Entering the Pit of Petrax costs 80 Adventure Coins.
